trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 管理的使用者介面相關集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Each Adorner can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: 每一個裝飾項可以啟用和停用。

trans-unit.source: Only enabled Adorner objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 只有已啟用的裝飾項物件將會接到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>點擊的測試和繪製訊息

trans-unit.source: An Adorner can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 裝飾項可視為使用者介面之間的 proxy 相關項目，包含所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>物件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[行為服務概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The Adorner constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: 裝飾項建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>和已啟用，根據預設。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>聯<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>，集合會設定這個屬性，讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>可以回撥</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>聯<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>已啟用。

trans-unit.source: If the Enabled property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用屬性為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>類別將傳送`HitTest`和`Paint`訊息至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>已啟用，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: 強制<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>重新整理其裝飾項視窗。

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 強制<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>重新整理其裝飾項視窗內指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 要失效的區域。

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 強制<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>重新整理其裝飾項視窗內指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>失效。
